The quality is not low - This is intentionally edited to look as thought it was made decades ago, playing off of a damaged reel.

I HIGHLY reccomend downloading the Planet Terror release by aXXo and the fake trailers that go along with the Grindhouse release, and watch them all in order. First watch planet terror, then the fake previews, then this. It's truly an experience that is difficult to duplicate, and that's how it was in theatres. And it was fuckin great.
If you don't understand the plot, I feel sorry for you. To truly appreciate the dialogue in this film you kind of have to be big on Tarantino films and catch all the references and jokes he makes. 

SPOILER --

What I loved about the plot as a whole is that they introduce a set of several girls in the beginning, take about a half hour to develop all of them as standalone characters with their own personalities, and make you believe they are the main characters, and then kill all of them off in about 2 minutes.

Then they introduce another set of girls and foreshadow that similar events will occur, a multiple murder using a vehicle to kill women in a manner that is sexually appealing to him, and instead they fight back and (I think) kill him in the end.

best film ever made.

Awesome movie.  Tarentino is the complete artist.  If you're looking for a "Chuck and Larry" or a "28 weeks later" type movie, then perhaps Tarentino isn't for you.  As one guy already said, this movie (as well as the other half of Grindhouse) was made to mimic the 70's B movie look and feel where double horror features were full of hot chicks, big tits, fast cars, drugs, bad dialogue, tons of cliches and plot lines that ended in mid-air.  Watch it for what it is or go download The Simpsons movie.  It's probably more on your level anyway.  ;)  Great upload and great D/L speed.  Thanks.
